songs.code:
use_bpm 128
use_synth :tb303
4.times do
  play :e5, release: 0.5
  sleep 0.5
  play :g5, release: 0.5
  sleep 0.5
end
in_thread do
  8.times do
    play :b5, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.25
    play :d6, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.25
  end
end

use_bpm 80
use_synth :piano
in_thread do
  6.times do
    play :c4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :e4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :g4, release: 3
    sleep 3
  end
end
in_thread do
  3.times do
    play :f4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :a4, release: 3
    sleep 3
  end
end

use_bpm 140
use_synth :dsaw
4.times do
  play :c5, release: 0.2
  sleep 0.2
  play :e5, release: 0.2
  sleep 0.2
end
in_thread do
  8.times do
    play :g5, release: 0.15
    sleep 0.15
    play :b5, release: 0.15
    sleep 0.15
  end
end

use_bpm 120
use_synth :blade
4.times do
  play :g4, release: 0.5
  sleep 0.5
  play :b4, release: 0.5
  sleep 0.5
end
in_thread do
  6.times do
    play :e5, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.25
    play :g5, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.25
  end
end

use_bpm 60
use_synth :piano
in_thread do
  3.times do
    play :c4, release: 4
    sleep 4
    play :e4, release: 4
    sleep 4
    play :g4, release: 4
    sleep 4
  end
end
in_thread do
  2.times do
    play :f4, release: 5
    sleep 5
    play :a4, release: 5
    sleep 5
  end
end

  play :g4, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
  play :e4, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
end
in_thread do
  6.times do
    play :d5, release: 0.2
    sleep 0.2
    play :f5, release: 0.2
    sleep 0.2
  end
end

use_bpm 100
use_synth :pluck
in_thread do
  5.times do
    play :d4, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.5
    play :g4, release: 0.3
    sleep 0.5
  end
end
in_thread do
  6.times do
    play :b4, release: 0.25
    sleep 0.25
    play :d5, release: 0.25
    sleep 0.25
  end
end

use_bpm 50
use_synth :dark_ambience
4.times do
  play :a3, release: 3
  sleep 3
  play :e4, release: 3
  sleep 3
  play :c5, release: 3
  sleep 3
end
in_thread do
  3.times do
    play :g3, release: 5
    sleep 5
    play :d4, release: 5
    sleep 5
  end
end

use_bpm 60
use_synth :hollow
in_thread do
  4.times do
    play :c4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :eb4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :g4, release: 2
    sleep 2
  end
end
in_thread do
  3.times do
    play :f4, release: 2
    sleep 2
    play :g4, release: 2
    sleep 2
  end
end

use_bpm 150
use_synth :prophet

  play :d5, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
  play :a5, release: 0.1
  sleep 0.25
end
in_thread do
  6.times do
    play :c6, release: 0.15
    sleep 0.2
    play :f6, release: 0.15
    sleep 0.2

end

  play :e4, release: 3
  sleep 3
  play :g4, release: 3
  sleep 3
